page.title: 06Old People in Aston Clinton
page.content: An Aston Clinton old peoples club has been formed so that many of those who would otherwise not see many people might meet on a regular monthly basis. Every year the old people are invited to Aston Clinton School to be entertained and given tea by the pupils of the school. This usually takes place at Easter time, during the bad Winter weather, many of the old are too frail to venture out. Many of the old people are keen gardeners and take part in the local horticultural show winning many of the prizes. They are very proud of their gardens. A number of the old people live in small communities in the village. This enables them to keep in close contact with their own age group.
